text:
"This #vaccine needs to be kept at -80°C. Only 20 countries in #Africa have the capacity to deal with cold storage & transport. What is going to happen with the rest?"

Mo Ibrahim, founder of the @Mo_IbrahimFdn, at the #ParisPeaceForum2020 👉 https://t.co/h3Ic4LNkrN
